title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Week 16 NFL Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Tues NFL W, Overrated AD
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Week 16 NFL Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Tues NFL W, Overrated AD
description:
Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Answers" on why the NFL MVP award is badly in need of an update (4:00), if the NFL should embrace regular Tuesday games (6:00), if more sports should expand their playoffs (9:00), the most overblown sports story of the year (11:00), and the most overrated star in sports (12:00). Then, the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 16 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Chargers/Texans (16:00), Bills/Patriots (22:00), Jags/Jets (23:00), Dolphins/Saints (24:00), Browns/Packers (25:00), Niners/Titans (26:00), Rams/Vikings (28:00), Lions/Falcons (30:00), and Bucs/Panthers (32:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
